amendment.description: To renew the moratorium on the return of veterans memorial objects to foreign nations without specific authorization in law.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1469 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1469 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Thomas. (consideration: CR S12589-12595) To renew the moratorium on the return of veterans memorial objects to foreign nations without specific authorization in law.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1469 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1469 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Thomas.
